entry.title: New release for Richy: 1.0.0
entry.content:
• Dashboard updated - more headings, portfolio divided into cards
  • Fixed closed transactions list - item detail link
  • Fixed not opening new transaction dialog automatically
  • Updated fetching of current price (+ new closed status)
  • Better item detail price representation + added value change
  • New possibility to set Redis URL + database number #122
  • Updated ETF basic info fetching + presentation
  • New possibility to set database port #122
  • Minor fixes
  • Item detail - value and percentage charts moved under tabs #124
  • Fixed documentation structure + new theme
  • Fixed assets charts in terms of not mixing different currenc
